mobs.LongDesc: The owner of the shop is standing here hoping that you will buy something.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This man bears an incredible resemblance to a rat. He is standing here behind
the counter hoping he can sell you some of his wares. Reid's eyes are
surprisingly trust inducing, but something tells you this mans friends don't
even trust him.

mobs.LongDesc: Urayla the Palm reader is standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This woman is not attractive. Nor is she unattractive. She has long hair
that borders on blond and brown at the same time. Her plain, non-descript
face does nothing to either attract or repulse you.

mobs.LongDesc: The Sen-Sen Ante Kid is playing a mean game of Dragon Poker.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is the dimensions best Dragon Poker player. As he raises the ante he
deftly tosses in a sen-sen. His sen-sen breath mints are his trademark and
you know he's gonna put on a good show tonight.

mobs.LongDesc: The Geek is carefully monitoring the game.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Geek is a rather large man. You have to be to succesfully manage a 
gambling joint on Deva. Despite his rather large size, he seems to be kind
of docile. But for all his docile appearance you are not sure you really
want to see him get upset.

mobs.LongDesc: A bouncer is standing here, eyeing you warily.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
If you thought The Geek was big, take a look at his bouncers. These bouncers
were obvioulsy chosen for their size and not for their intelligence. One of
the bouncers is trying hard to understand what the sign says. You are curious
if he even made it through kindergarten, but you refrain from asking him. No
sense in making him upset now is there???

mobs.LongDesc: Pidge is here ignoring the rule about markers.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Pidge is a slimy individual. He is so engrossed with gambling that he ignores
the common rules of decency. He has run his tab with The Geek so high that
he no longer plays with cash. Instead he leaves his marker, a sweet looking
little girl named Markie, to insure payment. Nice guy huh???

mobs.LongDesc: Grunk is playing cards here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Grunk is a nasty looking individual. He is easily 8 feet tall. He has bright
red eyes, and his teeth are as long as your fingers. He looks as if he could
eaisly rip your head off if he was so inclined. You are just glad you aren't
the one currently beating him at Dragon Poker.

mobs.LongDesc: A cute little girl named Markie is wondering who her new daddy will be.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This girl is the epitomy of cuteness. You take one look at her and wish you
could take her home with you. Good thing you aren't in the current game of
Dragon Poker or maybe you would be taking her home with you. She is Pidge's
current marker. If he doesn't make good with his payments, whoever wins her
will sell her into slavery.

mobs.LongDesc: Singe the shopkeeper wants to sell you his ward.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This man looks untrustworthy. Something about him makes you VERY uneasy.
Maybe it's the fact that he is selling an item that is totally worhtless..

mobs.LongDesc: Seamus O'Malley is here, inviting you to share a Guinness with him.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Seamus O'Malley is a burly man. His size coupled with the temper of the 
Irish makes you think twice about making him upset. He has bright red
hair and alot of freckles. Right now he is engaged in a story about how he 
once took on ten bloody brits at once. Makes you kind if nervous around a 
man with such a temper.

mobs.LongDesc: A purple dragon is here waiting to toast anyone it feels like toasting.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This dragon doesn't look too happy about you being here. In fact it doesn't
appear to be very happy about anything at all. A huge puff of smoke flares
out it's nostrils and it says 'Prepare to die FOOL!!'

mobs.LongDesc: A deveel stands here, looking for someone to cheat.
mobs.DetailedDesc: This deveel looks very untrustworthy.

mobs.LongDesc: A demon is here, reminding you forcefully that demon stands for dimension traveler.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This doesn't look at all like any demon you have ever imagined. He has no 
horns, no tail, heck..he ain't even red!!! Maybe their idea of demon in this
land differs slightly from your idea of demon???

mobs.LongDesc: Aliman is here, warning you to steer clear of the Great Skeeve.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is defenitely a weasel of a man. His very presence exudes craftiness
and guile. You get the notion that he would sell his own son if he felt it
fould be to his financial advantage.

mobs.LongDesc: A guitarist is here, plunging the depths of your soul with his poetry.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This man seems to know you inside and out. He is singing the very feelings
you have always felt, yet were never aware of.

mobs.LongDesc: A young lady is here, enjoying her coffee.
mobs.DetailedDesc: This woman is rather pretty. You notice that she seems to be at peace.

mobs.LongDesc: Aragath is here, trying to sell you some curious goods.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This man looks rather like all the other deveels around here, smug, devious
and ready to cheat anyone at any time.

mobs.LongDesc: A tough looking man is here, trying to sell you his protection...
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This man is very big. He also looks very mean. You wonder how a man like
this ever got into the insurance sales business.

mobs.LongDesc: Jimgrie is trying to sell you some sporting goods.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This man is the epitomy of fitness. He looks like he could run from this
dimension all the way to the next without the use of a dimension hopper,
and still not break a sweat.

mobs.LongDesc: Hakkan wants to sell you some footwear
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This deveel looks surprisingly honest. You aren't sure if you really want to
be surprised that bad though.

mobs.LongDesc: Dnth wants you to buy his books.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This man looks as if he has read way too many books. If he has read even a 
half of the books in his shop then he HAS read way too many books.

mobs.LongDesc: Davia is teaching magik.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This woman is very beautiful. Despite her beauty, she does not appear to
be a tame woman. You surmise that messing with her would not be in your
best interests.

mobs.LongDesc: A student of magik is taking lessons from Davia.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This pupil looks as if he has spent too much time studying. Hopefully, his
diligence in studying will pay off.

mobs.LongDesc: Doral is reading a newspaper.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This merchant looks like he is up on the latest events. The fact that he 
owns a newstand, with publishings from evry major dimension, indicates that
he not only looks like he knows it all, but probably DOES know it all.

mobs.LongDesc: Allison is eyeing some precious gems.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is a small woman. She is constantly squinting, perhaps from all the 
time she spends valuing the many jewels that come through her shop.

mobs.LongDesc: William the tanner is tanning somethings hide.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This man's skin is almost as dark as the hides he works on for a living. 
All that working on curing the hides has roughened William up to the point
where it looks as if he could definitely hold his own in a fight.

mobs.LongDesc: Gleep is here, eyeing you warily.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This dragon is large compared to you, but rather small compared to most 
other dragons you have run in to. He doesn't seem to be particularly hostile
as he isn't attacking you yet. Do you feel like pressing your luck and 
seeing if he gets meaner when he gets hungry?

mobs.LongDesc: Bunny the moll is here, playing the mob lord's woman.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This woman is definitely a hottie. She has all the right curves and all the
right looks. Whoever she is playing the moll for is a VERY lucky man.

mobs.LongDesc: Massha the apprentice of magik is here, wearing her gaudy makeup.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
OUCH! It hurts your eyes to even look at this woman. She is incredibly ugly,
she is incredibly overweight, and her makeup is so gaudy that it could draw
a good sized crowd at a circus.

mobs.LongDesc: Tanada the trollop is here, gazing at you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This woman is very beautiful. What really strikes you as odd is that you
don't even seem to mind her green skin. Aside from that she is a vision
straight out of any model magazine.

mobs.LongDesc: Chumley the troll is here, looking rather tough.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is one mean looking troll. He looks as if he could destroy you in about
a million different ways without even working up a sweat. You should probably
ask yourself, "Do you feel lucky?"

mobs.LongDesc: Aahz the pervect is here, screaming at you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is most likely the first time you have ever laid eyes on a pervect 
before. This particular pervect looks rather unpleasant. Unpleasant for you
that is. You are positively sure you would rather be doing a million other
things that standing right now, facing Aahz the pervect.

mobs.LongDesc: The great Skeeve is here, practicing his magik.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
HMMM. You are kinda disappointed. This is the GREAT SKEEVE?? He just looks
like some ordinary Joe Schmoe. Obviously his reputation must be highly
overrated. Still, he does seem to have a rather nice house. Maybe he used
his riches to buy his reputation? Yeah that must be it...

mobs.LongDesc: The statue of Garkin the magician is here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This statue depicts a man who looks both old and kind. It also seems to 
exude an aura of power. Some of the runes on the base of the statue lead you
to believe that it's contruction was mystic in nature.

mobs.LongDesc: A vampire is here, dancing like a maniac.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This vampire looks as if he is having a good time. He seems to be dancing
with such enthusiasm that his skin is even showing a little color. You
ponder the notion of a vampire having a heart attack...

mobs.LongDesc: A gorgeous female vampire is here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
WOW!! You never thought something undead could look so good. This female
vampire has all the right stuff. Why she is sitting here in a booth, and not
out on the dance floor is beyond you.

mobs.LongDesc: A ghoul is here, doing the boogie.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This ghoul is having a wonderful time. He is dancing the time away as if he
has never had this much fun before in his life (actually this is his second
life so that may very well be possible). Now and then his face almost even
cracks a smile...

mobs.LongDesc: A mummy is here, doing the limbo.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This mummy is bent over backwards almost to the point of falling. He seems
to be trying to make it under an imaginary line, without falling over...

mobs.LongDesc: A werewolf is here, doing the twist.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Now here is a good dancer. This werewolf is so limber is seems like he could
do just about any dance without a problem. Right now he is intent on doing
the good old Twist.

mobs.LongDesc: A regular patron is here, drinking a bloody mary.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The word regular must describe how often this person comes to this club, 
cause there is no other way it can be used to describe this monster. This
monster is sitting here drinking a "local" version of a bloody mary. You
shudder when you consider what the main ingredient must be.

mobs.LongDesc: A local villager is here, looking VERY pale.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Something about this villager disturbs you. Maybe it is his pale skin. Maybe
is is his red eyes. Maybe it is the widow's peak which crowns his head. Or
perhaps it is the fact that he has VERY sharp teeth...

mobs.LongDesc: Drahcir Woof is here, playing the sane partner.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Woof writers are an odd couple of werewolves. For some reason they tend
to actually LIKE humans. They also like to play "crazy partner-sane parnter".
Drahcir seems to be much better at playing the sane partner, maybe that 
should tell you something about him.

mobs.LongDesc: Idnew Woof is here, playing the crazy partner.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Woof writers are rather eccentric for werewolves.The seem to actually
LIKE humans. They also like playing "crazy partner-sane partner". Right now
Idnew must be playing the crazy partner. At least you hope she is anyway.

mobs.LongDesc: Vilhelm is here, dispatching nightmares.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Vilhelm looks like your typical vampire. He is very pale, he has very sharp
teeth, and he has a dark red tint to his eyes. His job seems to be making
sure that all the nightmares are evenly dispatched throughout all the
different dimensions.

mobs.LongDesc: An undead bartender is here, waiting to take your order.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This bartender is dead alright. Or rather he is UNdead. His hais is all
matted, and his eyes cannot seem to focus on anything. He seems to be doing
pretty well serving the drinks though.
